title: ISL Dictionary - Indian States and Cities
description: An ISL dictionary for Indian States and Cities, including everyday terms, legal terms, and more, created by ISLRTC to promote Indian Sign Language.

title: IWD 2024
description: A playlist for International Women's Day (IWD) 2024, showcasing Indian Sign Language (ISL) resources to promote awareness and education in ISLRTC.

title: Har Ghar Tiranga
description: A collection of videos promoting the 'Har Ghar Tiranga' initiative by the government of India, with ISL interpretation for accessibility.

title: IWD 2024
description: Celebrating International Women's Day 2024 with a special collection of ISL videos, featuring important themes and ISL interpretation for accessibility.

title: 100 Concept Video
description: A series of 100 ISL concept videos by ISLRTC, covering various fundamental concepts of Indian Sign Language for learners and educators.

title: 7th ISL Competiton 2024
description: Welcome to ISLRTC’s YouTube channel where you can learn about Indian Sign Language (ISL), the sign language used by the deaf community in India. ISLRTC is an autonomous body under the DEPwD, MSJ&E, Government of India. ISLRTC was established in 2015 to promote the use of ISL to make society accessible for deaf people. ISLRTC’s YouTube channel contains various resources such as: ISL dictionary with everyday, legal, academic, and financial terms, a 30-40 hour online self-learning course on basic ISL, 200 signs for communication with young children, NCERT textbooks in ISL, and important government announcements in ISL. Please share your feedback at islrtcnewdelhi@gmail.com.

title: Employability Skills for PwDs
description: This playlist focuses on employability skills for persons with disabilities (PwDs), offering resources and information that help empower the deaf community through Indian Sign Language (ISL). Learn key employability skills and make the workplace more accessible for PwDs.

title: Financial Terms in ISL - Retail Banking
description: This playlist covers financial terms related to retail banking, explained in Indian Sign Language (ISL). It's an essential resource for learning the vocabulary needed to understand banking concepts and services.

title: Financial Terms in ISL - Trade Life Cycle
description: Learn financial terms related to the trade life cycle in this playlist, explained in Indian Sign Language (ISL). This resource will help you understand concepts related to trading, settlements, and the financial markets.

title: Financial Terms in ISL - Bonds
description: This playlist focuses on financial terms related to bonds, explained in Indian Sign Language (ISL). It covers key concepts in bond markets, from bond issuance to trading and investing.

title: Cyber Jagrookta
description: This playlist is dedicated to cyber awareness (Cyber Jagrookta) in ISL. It provides essential information on cybersecurity topics, helping the deaf community stay informed and safe online.

title: Class-2 English - Marigold
description: This playlist contains Class 2 English lessons from the 'Marigold' series, explained in Indian Sign Language (ISL). It helps children in the deaf community learn English through interactive lessons.

title: Class-1 Mathematics - Math-Magic
description: This playlist includes Class 1 Mathematics lessons from the 'Math-Magic' series, explained in Indian Sign Language (ISL). It helps young deaf learners understand basic math concepts.

title: Class-1 English - Raindrop
description: This playlist features Class 1 English lessons from the 'Raindrop' series, explained in Indian Sign Language (ISL). It offers foundational English lessons for young deaf learners.

title: Financial Terms in ISL - Bonds
description: This playlist focuses on financial terms related to bonds, explained in Indian Sign Language (ISL). It covers key concepts in bond markets, from bond issuance to trading and investing.

title: Class 6 - Hindi - बाल रामकथा
description: This playlist includes Hindi lessons for Class 6 based on the 'बाल रामकथा' series, explained in Indian Sign Language (ISL). It provides deaf students with access to key cultural and literary content in Hindi.

title: Class 6 - hindi - दूर्वा भाग 1
description: This playlist contains Hindi lessons for Class 6, specifically focusing on the 'दूर्वा भाग 1' chapter. Learn and understand the content in Indian Sign Language (ISL) to make the subject accessible to the deaf community in India.

title: Class-6 Geography-पृथ्वी - हमारा आवास
description: This playlist covers the 'पृथ्वी - हमारा आवास' chapter from Class 6 Geography. Explore the concepts and understand them in ISL to aid accessibility for the deaf community.

title: Class 6 - English - Honeysuckle
description: This playlist features the English lessons from Class 6, focusing on the 'Honeysuckle' book. These lessons are presented in ISL to make them accessible to the deaf community.

title: Class VI - Science
description: This playlist contains Science lessons for Class VI, with a focus on important scientific concepts, all explained in Indian Sign Language (ISL) to aid accessibility.

title: Class-V English - Marigold
description: This playlist covers the English Marigold book for Class V, with all lessons in ISL to make the content accessible for students in the deaf community.

title: Class-V EVS Hindi Medium
description: This playlist features Environmental Studies (EVS) lessons for Class V in Hindi Medium, presented in ISL to ensure that students from the deaf community can access the lessons.

title: National Book Trust (NBT)- Veergatha Series
description: This playlist features the National Book Trust's (NBT) 'Veergatha Series,' a collection of heroic stories, all presented in ISL for easy access by the deaf community.

title: Covid - 2021
description: This playlist contains videos related to Covid-19 in 2021, offering important information and updates in Indian Sign Language (ISL) for the deaf community to stay informed.

title: ISL Dictionary - Agricultural Terms
description: This playlist provides an ISL dictionary of agricultural terms, ensuring that the deaf community can access essential knowledge related to agriculture in a simple and understandable manner.
